com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.utils.v201409.shopping

Class ProductPartitionNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.utils.v201409.shopping.ProductPartitionNode

  • public class ProductPartitionNode
extends Object
    A node in a tree of ProductPartitions. Used to construct AdGroupCriterion objects for shopping campaigns.
    Author:
    Josh Radcliff

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds a NEW child for childDimension under this node.

      Removes all children from this node and modifies this node to be a UNIT node that is biddable.

      Removes all children from this node and modifies this node to be a UNIT node excluded from bidding.

      Modifies this node to be a SUBDIVISION node.

        public ProductPartitionNode asExcludedUnit()

        this node, updated to an excluded node

        IllegalStateException - if this node is the root node

                          Long bidInMicros)

        bidInMicros - a null or positive long
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if bidInMicros < 0L
